titles.title: Small Business Property Reinvestment Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the temporary increase in limitations on expensing of certain depreciable business assets.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/22/2009--Introduced. Small Business Property Reinvestment Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2010 the increased expensing allowance for depreciable business assets.
